>
[Planar Ribbon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=670)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />

<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 60,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

By twisting and twirling this ordinary-looking leather ribbon, you can temporarily bend a rift in space.
